text: Hi , I want to update the hubdb table row with serveless post command how I can do it ?
can we add condition like update column from table where rowid=1 ?

I am looking for serverless post method help

I have videos table in hubdb and having column with name likes
from front end when person will lcick on like it will increment in hubdb with serverless function how I can do ?

you'll need to make a POST request to your `_hcms/api/<endpoint>` endpoint. within the function, you'll need to interact with the HubDB API to make whatever hubdb updates you need. check out the cms-event-registration function for an example of a function that uses HubDB: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-event-registration/blob/master/src/event.functions/eventSignup.js#L4>
